sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Get General Approver Group SysId from system property
Get Hardware Approver Group SysId from system property

sys_hub_flow_logic.comment: Add Approver to Group Sys IDs list
Assign Group Sys IDs to output and trim starting trailing comma if necessary

sys_hub_input_scripts.script: {"count":{"scriptActive":true,"script":"// Return the length of the group array\nreturn fd_data.flow_var.group_sys_ids.split(\u0027,\u0027).length;"}}

sys_hub_flow_logic.comment: Trim starting and ending comma if any from Group Sys IDs string
